thread.title: R Madhavan, Pawan Kalyan to address Harvard graduates on February 11-12
thread.title_full: R Madhavan, Pawan Kalyan to address Harvard graduates on February 11-12

author: IANS
title: R Madhavan, Pawan Kalyan to address Harvard graduates on February 11-12
text:
Akshay Kumar's ex-girlfriends Shilpa Shetty Kundra and Raveena Tandon bond at the Satyug event! 
Monday has begun on a grand note indeed for South cinema as actors Pawan Kalyan and R. Madhavan have been invited as guest speakers at the 14th edition of the India Conference at Harvard! Wow, what a honour. It is one of the largest student-run conferences with a focus on India in the US. The conference, which will take place on February 11 and 12, is hosted at the Harvard Business School and Harvard Kennedy School by the graduate students of Harvard University. The event will bring together business leaders, entertainment professionals, and many other leaders to engage in a conversation about India’s path to global leadership. “The king of Tollywood and Jana Sena party, Pawan Kalyan will be speaking at India Conference 2017 at Harvard,” read a post on the Twitter handle of the India Conference 2017, on Monday. “Really looking forward to having R. Madhavan as a speaker at India Conference 2017,” the post read further. Madhavan is excited and tweeted that he can’t wait to be part of the conference. This is a great privilege and we are excited too. What about you? Can’t wait folks https://t.co/80UQaKF1Pm 
— Ranganathan Madhavan (@ActorMadhavan) January 16, 2017 
In other news, Pawan Kalyan will soon be seen In Katamarayudu opposite Shruti Haasan. The movie is reportedly a remake of the Tamil movie Veeram. On 13th January, the makers released a powerful poster of the actor that created quite an impression. The teaser will be out on 26th January. 10 days to go! As for Madhavan, he has already wrapped up the Tamil remake of Charlie, he has also been shooting for Vikram Veda opposite Vijay Sethupathi. He will be playing a cop, while Vijay Sethupathi will take on the role of a gangsgter. Both their looks for this modern take on the mythological tale of Vikramaditya were recently revealed, Vijay Sethupathi salt n pepper look was specially praised. 
 44 pm Topics:
